content: cristi s stripey sock recipe materials needed 100g of your favorite self striping sock yarn size us1 40 circular needles waste yarn darning needles toe up using the turkish cast on and size us1 needles wrap 12 stitches around the needles this will give you 24 stitches for the toe 12 on each needle to increase the toe use this method row 1 k1 yo knit to one stitch from end of needle yo k1 repeat on second needle row 2 k1 knit the yo tbl knit to next yo knit it tbl k1 continue this until there are 64 stitches total then knit in stockinette stitch until the foot is 2 shorter than the desired length then grab some waste yarn and knit half the stitches 32 onto the waste yarn place those 32 stitches back onto the left needle again and knit them again with the working yarn this will leave a placeholder for the afterthought heel continue the leg in stockinette until the desired length then do 10 rounds of 1x1 ribbing for the bind off use jssbo as follows k1 yo p1 pull the yo over the purled stitch and then pull the knit stitch over the purled stitch that should give you one stitch on the right needle yo in reverse put the yarn over the needle going the opposite way k1 pull the yo over the knit stitch then pull the purl stitch over the knit stitch continue until all stitches are bound off top down using a us 1 needle and the long tail cast on loosely cast on 64 stitches and work 10 rounds of 1x1 ribbing then continue in stockinette stitch until the leg is the desired length then grab some waste yarn and knit half the stitches 32 onto the waste yarn place those 32 stitches back onto the left needle again and knit them again with the working yarn this will leave a placeholder for the afterthought heel continue in stockinette stitch for the foot until it measures 2 shorter than the desired length then start the toe decreases as follows row 1 k1 ssk knit to 3 stitches from the end of the needle k2tog k1 repeat on second needle row 2 knit all stitches do the decreases until you have 12 stitches on each needle ending with row 1 then kitchner the stitches to close the toe afterthought heel with the sock facing right side up the cuff pointing up and the toe pointing down carefully unravel the waste yarn and put the two row of live stitches on needles you should have 32 stitches on one needle the top needle and 31 on the other the bottom needle join yarn and pick up a stitch at the corner of the heel at the beginning of the row then knit across the rown and pick up two stitches at the end of the row on the first needle only for the second needle pick
